statements: DELETE FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE id = 1 AND type = 'expense';
DELETE FROM expenses_and_revenues WHERE date < '2021-06-30' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM revenues WHERE source = 'Online Sales' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM revenues WHERE source = 'Sales' AND date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 100 AND expense_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM farm_expenses WHERE farm_id = 200 AND expense_id = 101;
